name: A walk, the morning after the storm
name_original: A walk, the morning after the storm
description:
Made for the Seafolk Jam with bitsy, borksy, pixsy, add bitsy audio, and a few hacks.  Music  by Carrie Z.

Based on this photo of a Lake Michigan lighthouse after an ice storm, which was going around twitter a couple weeks ago and which I haven't stopped thinking about since. I miss Lake Michigan a lot.
